content:
/>
VIII.iv.2.C.1.c
.
Requesting FPOW Examinations
After the Veteran’s FPOW status has been confirmed, request the
Former Prisoner of War (POW) Protocol Disability Benefits Questionnaire
.
Reference
:  For more information on requesting FPOW examinations, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 2.C.2
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section C - Development and Examination Request for Claims Based on Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Status
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section C
